thread.title: Tesla hits pause on Model 3 production, again

title: Tesla hits pause on Model 3 production, again
text:
Tesla hits pause on Model 3 production, again 6:37pm BST - 01:25 
New worries about Tesla and its mass market Model 3 sedan, as the electric car maker halted production of the more-affordable model for the second time since February. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New worries about Tesla and its mass market Model 3 sedan, as the electric car maker halted production of the more-affordable model for the second time since February. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J3QiYj
